name: Citeclass Dark Mode
description: The best (and only) dark theme for the "eclass" used by the Colegio International Torrequebrada School. This is recommended to students having to submit projects to the site late during the night, without wanting sore eyes ;) This theme is currently still a work in progress and will be regularly updated, so make sure to check this page every now and again. If you have any suggestions, or encounter any possible bugs, and are a member of the CIT school, then feel free to message me through instagram (@elptricko). I hope you enjoy this theme :D
additional_info:
v0.1 - Changed basic pages and colors to match the dark mode. Future updates containing more detail are yet to come.
v0.1.1 - Fixed a few issues and changed more parts of the site.
v0.2 - Added many new color changes to more parts of the main site.
v0.2.1 - Extended the theme to the main login page.
v0.3 - Made a bunch of tweaks. In addition, the calendar in the exams section of the page, is now also dark.
v0.9.9 - The whole page should be fully darkened, though I may have missed some areas. It is not on v1.0 yet because of a major bug with each subject section. As soon as this is resolved, I will update the theme and have it be 1.0 - Again, if you have any suggestions/find any issues with the theme, feel free to message me.
v1.0 - Bug should be solved and we are now on 1.0! Still lots I can tweak and improve, so make sure to tell me if you find anything important or have any suggestions. Hope you enjoy!
